topic: How to Create a New Theme
content: To create a new theme, add a new key to the `themes` object in your `tailwind.config.js` file. You can define custom `layout` and `colors` for this new theme.
To apply your new theme, add its name as a CSS class to a root element, such as `<html>` or `<body>`. For example, a theme named `purple-dark` would be applied with `<html class="purple-dark">`.
Once a new theme is applied, all components that use semantic colors (e.g., `color="primary"`) will automatically adopt the new color palette defined in your custom theme.
